title: Cruz: Americans Deserve to Know Whether DOJ Harms Law Enforcement Efforts to Protect the Public ...
text: ( Source : Ted Cruz ) WASHINGTON, D.C. - This week, U.S. Sen. Ted Cruz (R-Texas) sent a letter to Attorney General Loretta Lynch requesting additional information about the Department of Justice 's ( DOJ ) interactions with state and local law
